name: Magic Mess
description:
Description

You are a wizard in your tower and you've been messing around with some magic as curious wizards do, but now you've managed to enchant and haunt some barrels! Defend yourself and your tower from the onslaught of crazed explosive barrels in this top-down tower-rotating shooter by rotating your aim with the [R] key and firing your lightning spells at the barrels with [SPACEBAR]. The rotate key rotates the tower's aim one way, hit the powerups to change direction.
